Description:
Responsible of preparing architectural working drawings for projects.
Produce CAD drawings for presentation (plans, elevations, sections, details) and Architectural specification
Design architectural elements as required (joinery, doors, cornicing, architrave, bathrooms, and kitchens)
Work closely with the design team to prepare, develop and produce client concept designs and presentation documents that include plans, elevations, perspective visuals, and furniture drawingsSkills
Skills:
Bachelor degree in Architecture is a must.
Proven working experience as an working drawings Architect
Strong portfolio to prove artistic skills
Expert knowledge of building products, construction details and relevant rules, regulations and standards
Strong imagination and the ability to think and create in three dimensions
Visual awareness and an eye for details
